statusMessage:
Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Belgium', 'Norway', 'Singapore', 'Energy', 'ETFs'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Belgium', 'Norway', 'Singapore', 'ETFs']

    @allure.step("Start retest manual AT_55!00_039 of filters application in the 'Live shares prices' widget")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('cur_country', ['es', 'ua', 'au'])
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('cur_role', ["NoReg", "Auth", "NoAuth"])
    @pytest.mark.test_039
    def test_039(self, worker_id, d, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password):
        """
        Check: Filters application in the 'Live shares prices' widget
        Language: All
        License: CYSEC, SCB, ASIC
        Author: Kasila
        """
    
        bid = build_dynamic_arg_for_us_55(
            d, worker_id, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country, cur_role,
            "55", "ReTests of Manual Detected Bugs",
            "039", "Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the "
                   "'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page"
            )
    
        page_conditions = Conditions(d, "")
        link = page_conditions.preconditions(
            d, CapitalComPageSrc.URL, "", cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password)
    
        menu = MenuSection(d, link)
        cur_item_link = menu.open_shares_market_menu(d, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country, link)
    
        test_element = AppliedFilters(d, cur_item_link, bid)

labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!039 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Belgium', 'France', 'Great Britain', 'ETFs', 'Telecommunications Services'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Belgium', 'France', 'Great Britain']

Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Canada', 'France', 'Spain', 'Financials', 'Telecommunications Services'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Canada', 'France', 'Spain', 'Financials']

Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['France', 'Italy', 'Switzerland', 'Cyclical Consumer Goods & Services', 'Healthcare'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['France', 'Italy', 'Switzerland']

AssertionError: Bug#039. Expected result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are displayed ['Great Britain', 'France', 'Netherlands', 'ETFs', 'Energy']
Actual result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are not displayed after selecting an item from the "Most traded" dropdown ['France', 'Great Britain', 'Netherlands']

AssertionError: Bug#039. Expected result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are displayed ['Singapore', 'Sweden', 'Netherlands', 'ETFs', 'Technology']
Actual result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are not displayed after selecting an item from the "Most traded" dropdown ['Netherlands', 'Singapore', 'Sweden', 'ETFs']

AssertionError: Bug#039. Expected result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are displayed ['Ireland', 'Japan', 'United States of America', 'Healthcare']
Actual result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are not displayed after selecting an item from the "Most traded" dropdown ['Ireland', 'Japan', 'United States of America', 'Financials', 'Healthcare']

AssertionError: Bug#039. Expected result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are displayed ['Belgium', 'Italy', 'Sweden', 'Basic Materials', 'ETFs']
Actual result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are not displayed after selecting an item from the "Most traded" dropdown ['Belgium', 'Italy', 'Sweden', 'Basic Materials']

AssertionError: Bug#039. Expected result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are displayed ['France', 'Great Britain', 'Spain', 'Non-Cyclical Consumer Goods & Services', 'Telecommunications Services']
Actual result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are not displayed after selecting an item from the "Most traded" dropdown ['France', 'Great Britain', 'Spain']
